FuncDef: This command specifies the TCP/UDP port to match the source port of the packet.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the source port number to be used as a match criteria expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies the port list name to be used as a match criteria for thedestination port.
Specifies the 16 bit mask to be applied when matching the destination port. Values-[0x0000..0xFFFF] | [0..65535] | [0b0000000000000000..0b1111111111111111].
